servinfo.title: Table 3: The Engine Starts with Difficulty

testgroup.ptxt: Check that the fuel tank is correctly filled and that the fuel type is suitable.
testgroup.question: Is the fuel type suitable and the tank correctly filled?

action.ptxt: Refill the fuel tank correctly. Bleed the low and high pressure diesel circuit.

testgroup.ptxt: Check that engine speed reaches 250 rpm under the starter motor, as displayed on SUZUKI scan tool.
testgroup.question: Is the starter motor working properly?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC P0335: CKP Sensor Circuit:F9Q .
Go to DTC P0016: CKP – CMP Correlation:F9Q .

testgroup.ptxt: Check that the engine earthing is in order (oxidation, tightness, etc.).
Check the mounting, the air gap and the condition of the sensor (overheating).
testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.

testgroup.ptxt: Check that the fuel circuit is leak-tight.
If the fault is still present, refer to DTC P0089: Fuel Flow Actuator Performance:F9Q of troubleshooting for 2.DEF: Measured pressure too low.
testgroup.question: Is there in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.

item.ptxt: Check that the heater plugs are actuated using “Pre/post Heater Relay Control” on SUZUKI scan tool.
Check that the fuel flow actuator are actuated using “IMV/Flow actuator” on SUZUKI scan tool.
Check the exhaust system referring to Test 1: Exhaust System Check:F9Q .
Check the low pressure circuit referring to Test 2: Low Pressure Circuit Check:F9Q .
Check for leaks in the high pressure circuit referring to Test 8: Injector Malfunction:F9Q .
Check the turbocharged air inlet circuit referring to Test 3: Checking the Turbocharged Air Inlet Circuit:F9Q .
Check the MAF sensor referring to Test 4: MAF Sensor:F9Q .
Check the consistency of the signal from the engine coolant temperature sensor.
Check that the injectors are working properly (return leakage too high, clogging, sticking) referring to Test 8: Injector Malfunction:F9Q .
Check the engine timing (and the position of the high pressure pump sprocket).

action.ptxt: Repair or replace the defective part.
